meeting_request.purpose: Dealing with emotional distress after a disappointing academic experience
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Carlos, a senior Art major. Last semester I took a course in art history that I found challenging and uninteresting. I’ve been struggling with the material, and I’m not sure if I should have even tried it. After the first few weeks, I started to feel really down. I didn’t want to do the work anymore, and I started avoiding art-related activities. Now I’m in a major course, and I’m really invested in it, but I’m also really scared of failing. I feel like everyone else in my class is doing better than me, and I’m starting to feel like a failure. I don’t know if I should be still in the course, or if I should drop out. I’m reaching out because I’m worried about how to cope with this emotional distress, and I’m not sure who to talk to.
